name: Hero's Birth
description:
This is hot-seat game, where you can challenge your friend and decide who is real hero that Worthy of life.


The game was developed during closed one - week jam hosted by SkillBox.

Big thanks to Team 18:

Fomychev Ivan - Unity Developer (90% of work was done by him)
Yana Roshchupkina  - 2D Artist
Petrov"StefanPtr" Stepan - Game Designer (Designed skills and buffs for game)Dmytry "Emerick Grimm" Vynarchuk - Game Designer (Idea and Project Management)

Also we used assets  from:

Kenney, JavierZumer,richardemoore,JeffNevington
